VERIFICATION.Error: Couldn't find the code in your bio, please make sure you pasted it and applied the changes, then wait ~30s and retry.

GATHERING_LOCATIONS.Intro: Gathering location allows you to easily search for a gatherable item and see details about it, where to find it and create an alarm for a given node. Just input a name in the field above and let it find what you're looking for !

LEVEQUESTS.Title: Levequests
LEVEQUESTS.Add_to_list: Add this levequest's items to a list

INTRO.Title: Levequests
INTRO.First_line: This page allows you to search for a given leve or multiple leves to create a list from the result(s)
INTRO.Second_line: Select a job, input a level range, you'll get a listing of the corresponding leves that you can check and add to a list, recipes will be automatically added to the selected list.
INTRO.Third_line: You can also search by name, in case you know what you're looking for.

TEAMS.Title: Команды
TEAMS.Webhook_error: There was an error while creating the Discord webhook:
TEAMS.Create_invite_one_day: Create a new invite (expires in 1 day)
TEAMS.Assign_list: Assign this list to a team
TEAMS.Delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this team?
TEAMS.Invite_error: Team invite not found or expired.

TEAMS.Already_in_team: You are already in this team

NOTIFICATIONS.Webhook_setup_complete: The **{{teamName}}** team will now be tracked in this channel.
NOTIFICATIONS.List_added_notification: The list **[{{listName}}]({{listUrl}})** has been added to the team.
NOTIFICATIONS.List_removed_notification: The list **[{{listName}}]({{listUrl}})** has been removed from the team.
NOTIFICATIONS.Name_changed: The **{{oldName}}** team has been renamed to **{{newName}}**.

MARKETBOARD.Title: Marketboard Informations
MARKETBOARD.Error: XIVAPI or Companion API is currently down, please wait a moment before retrying.

DESCRIPTION.Lists: Create lists to get informations about all materials, share them with your friends, everything starts here ! Just search for an item, expand filters to get specific items, and start crafting things.
DESCRIPTION.Public_lists: Clone lists created by the community that help you building things, levekits, log completion, airships, BiS gear, everything can be found here.
DESCRIPTION.Alarms: Create alarms to make sure you wont miss a node spawn, organize them in groups, import them ingame, everything is possible.
DESCRIPTION.Gathering_location: Find informations about any gathering item, create an alarm, get instant coordinates, closest aetheryte, required book, and more !
DESCRIPTION.Rotations: Create crafting rotations, test them inside the simulator, or theorycraft rotations using the custom simulator !
DESCRIPTION.Levequests: Find some levequests for a given job and/or level range, see instant benefit on them and create lists for them.
DESCRIPTION.Macro_translation: Got some macros but not in your language? Go to macro translator and translate it back to your language so it works in your ffxiv !
